townescape.que.text1: A town escape is a live game in which a group of more than 8 people try to escape from a room or more or they try to find some precious object solving a serie of puzzles and riddles in a time of 90 minutes.
townescape.que.text2: The objective will be defined in the initial explanation or during the game.
townescape.benefici.1: Great for groups to improve communication in families, friends or colleagues. Popularly known as "Team building".
townescape.benefici.2: Enhancing creativity and thinking. It helps to think about things differently. "Think out of the box".
townescape.benefici.3: Transporting you to a different world, wake your wit and mental acuity.
townescape.consell.2: Control of objects and clues found and used.
townescape.consell.3: Respect the environment, disassemble, but do not destroy.
